price: 78. Waxaan idiin la nimid Xaq, badankiinnuse Xaqa baad nacdaan.
arabic: لَقَدۡ جِئۡنَٰكُم بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَكُمۡ لِلۡحَقِّ كَٰرِهُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: laqad ji'nākum bil-ḥaqi walākinna aktharakum lil'ḥaqqi kārihūna
